data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Fier to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fier, Albania
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Fier, Albania today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 165 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,877 believers in Fier and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Fier to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, remember the Turk people. Make the Turk people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Fier, Albania not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Fier to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Fier.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
